mapper.sql: parent_id, blog_id, accountId, content, user_type, create_time, reply_user_id, reply_user_name,like_count
mapper.update: update comment set like_count = like_count + 1 where id =#{id};
update comment set like_count = like_count - 1 where id =#{id};
mapper.select: select c.id,c.parent_id,c.blog_id,c.accountId,c.content,c.user_type,c.reply_user_id,c.reply_user_name,c.create_time,u.header_url,u.username,c.like_count from comment c left join user u on c.accountId = u.accountId where c.blog_id = #{blogId} and c.parent_id = #{parentId} order by c.create_time asc;
select count(*) from comment where blog_id = #{blogId}
